name: Isolated
description: Isolated is an action-packed 2D side scrolling shooter in which you shoot, shoot and shoot ALIENS!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 64 Processor: 2 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 460/Radeon HD 5850/Intel HD 4600 with at least 1024 MB video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
